subject: College Athletics
Lacrosse
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The lacrosse team, coming off a 2012 championship, sprinted up and down hills, tossed medicine balls and carried teammates during off-season workouts to build targeted strength and endurance.
snippet: The lacrosse team, coming off a 2012 championship, sprinted up and down hills, tossed medicine balls and carried teammates during off-season workouts to build targeted strength and endurance.
